author: lgo
msg: - r2258+r2319: resolves the segfault reported by philipm on dev@subversion.a.o,
by properly reporting requests as cancelled if the status line can't be read
while having a auth callback hooked.
Manual merge fix to undo changes in r2093 & r2094 that don't merge cleanly

author: lgo
msg: - r2339: merge all recreated certifices,.p12 and server private key.

author: lgo
msg: In the test suite, use the new OnConditionThat macro to pass conditional
arguments to server and response setup. This removes the currently used
hack based on knowledge of the MockHTTPinC internals.
* test/MockHTTPinC/*: Update to the latest version.
(ssltunnel_basic_auth): Replace ternary op with OnConditionThat macro.
digest_authentication): Replace ternary op with OnConditionThat macro.

author: lgo
msg: (validate_server_certificate): Log depth of cert in case of unknown failures.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Set encrypt's config if we create it, but don't worry about decrypt bucket as
(serf_bucket_ssl_encrypt_create): If we have a config, set it.
